title: Got bullied by those 2 racists again :(

embed.description: Maybe Riot should add a mute button in victory/defeat screen.

body:
http://imgur.com/a/a9hvy
saw those 2 racists and got bullied again
Riot : (

replies.body: and ... what do you want to accomplish by posting this here?
are you saying i'm in the wrong section of the forum?

no, just wondering what you want to accomplish.

You aren't saying anything about it, just a statement you made. No opinion, no questions, no requests.

So what is it that you want to do?
You should submit the unadulterated version via a support ticket if you want anything to be done about it.

Hi, I am under the assumption that you desire this kind of behavior to stop?
Assuming this is a continues encounter i think you should use some of the resources riot provides to us players. I know they started a discord report server [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/xkRfEHZs-discord-moderation) and you can also report them in the victory/defeat screen. Otherwise the last resource i can think of is what your using now, posting a problem and then wait for riot to respond asking for more detailed information.
I mean sure that's inappropriate behavior, but not sure if you can call one line of text bullying. Unless there's more. Not saying that makes it ok if it's only one line.
